name: Snowman Christmas Adventure
description:
Snowman Christmas Adventure is a 3D arcade game where you play as a magic snowman. Your goal -  save Christmas by leaving gifts at people's doors, but you quickly melt away, so you need to hurry up. Standing in place, you produce ice puddles, which will help you further advance through the locations. 
You produce useful ice puddles while standing still. Press R to absorb any created snowman in the area. Mouse wheel to zoom in and out, F to look around.
